MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KA7 postcode area of Ayr. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.38am. Our emergency response team have arrived on site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.45am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:30am on Thursday 29th April 2021.
